data.message: Applying the 11 Design Principles as an AUDIT CHECKLIST transforms design iteration. Process: 1) Screenshot current design, 2) Evaluate each principle (Balance, Unity, Contrast, Emphasis, Repetition, Pattern, Rhythm, Movement, Proportion, Harmony, Variety), 3) Mark ✓/⚠️/❌, 4) Fix the ❌ and ⚠️ items specifically. Key fixes for Sonora: Emphasis (made text 200px dominant), Balance (added "a" letter + line on right), Pattern (enlarged background "S"), Movement (repositioned circles to frame text). This systematic approach replaces guessing with intentional design decisions.
